message.raw:
Fixing issue where clicking checkboxes in the treeview wouldn't emit the
'pressed' signal. We now subclass and hook into mouseReleaseEvent, emitting the
custom signal mouseLeftRelease instead. This one *is* emitted when checkboxes are
clicked on.

Working on making the parent and child checkboxes consistent in the groups tab

message:
Fixing issue where clicking checkboxes in the treeview wouldn't emit the
'pressed' signal. We now subclass and hook into mouseReleaseEvent, emitting the
custom signal mouseLeftRelease instead. This one *is* emitted when checkboxes are
clicked on.

Working on making the parent and child checkboxes consistent in the groups tab
